title: Use this font!
content: If your trying to make a nice looking website, use this font! It's called 'Open Sans' and it's free!

title: I want something new for my website!
content: I'm trying to find a font I can use for my website. I want something that looks modern and clean. Any suggestions?

title: What fonts do you use for your website?
content: I use Gotham because it is a nice looking font and it's easy to read.
